name: Collapsed Emergencies
description:
SAVE THE CITY FROM IMPENDING CHAOS

In Collapsed Emergencies, you are tasked with dispatching the emergency services of a city falling into chaos. Receive calls, choose your employees depending on the distances and their department, and survive as long as possible!

FEATURES

- Nail-biting task management. Make the best choices to solve emergencies as succesfully as possible and survive another day.

- Detailed map of the city, where you track dispatched vehicles.

- Randomized calls, each with specific conditions and ambient text.

- Gorgeous voxel art.

CREDITS

Game made by Claudia Vega, Diego Pérez, Raúl Pernía, Jordi Galobardes, Javier Llorente and Ricardo Cancela.
